content: Hello, do you want to buy brand new smartphones at 70% off? Text YES for more info!
Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I help you with your plumbing, electrical, or HVAC needs today?
Don't miss out! Go to phonesalez.discount.xyz for exclusive offers now. Get rich quick!
It appears your message is unrelated to our home services. If you have a plumbing, electrical, or HVAC need, please let us know.
reason: Customer was identified as sending spam messages.
